long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Eases the pain of filling forms when hiring and renting cars.

It pre-populates hire details on forms _where possible_ saving you time on filling locations, dates and times.

For example, details while trying to hire or rent a car from Thrifty.com will be copied and can be used to pre-populate the forms on Budget.com, Alamo, Europcar and more.

Supported sites are as follows :
Alamo
Avis
Budget
Enterprise
Europcar
Hertz
National
Thrifty

Disclaimer: Due to complexities of various sites, fields in a form may not be filled in for you, so please review before submitting.
